programs.name: advanced shroud
programs.flavor: Boot up or shut up!
programs.load: All firendly models within GREEN may reroll any failed defense rolls due to attacks that were made at GREEN range or long range.

programs.name: adware
programs.flavor: BUY MILITEC COLA IT BUBBLES THE BRAIN
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Attacks by Hacked rivals are Unwieldy.

programs.name: adware
programs.flavor: You see enemies. I see customers.
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Whenever a hacked rival attempts an action and fails the roll, draw one Loot and equip it to any character.
programs.refresh: Reload when there are no hacked rivals in play.

programs.name: aerial strike
programs.flavor: I'm calling this one in.
programs.load: [Blast, Deadly Crits]
programs.refresh: Reload when a friendly Character is taken out.

programs.name: alley rat
programs.load: Hack the taget.
programs.effect: Attacks by Hacked rivals that target this character count as Unwieldy.

programs.name: ambush
programs.flavor: Target acquired, light 'em up.
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Ranged attacks targeting Hacked rivals gain Accurate.

programs.name: armed and dangerous
programs.load: Target rival must discard 1 gear.

programs.name: awesome memes
programs.flavor: Ok the next one isn't a cat, I swear…
programs.effect: When ever a friendly model wihtin GREEN uses a Luck token to reroll a die, do not discard the token if the reroll is a success.

programs.name: balloon animals
programs.flavor: Her name is Carver…
programs.load: Discard a Luck token and place it on the board within YELLOW.
programs.effect: When an enemy model ends a move within RED of a Luck token placed by this program, this model may make a Melee attack against it for free regardless of range or visibility. Then discrad the token.

programs.name: ban hammer
programs.load: Target rival must flip a Running program of your choice to the Loaded side. Its program effect immediately ends.

programs.name: berserker
programs.flavor: Adrenal boosted rage - when and where you need it.
programs.effect: When this model takes a move action, it may also make a Melee attack of the same color for free.

programs.name: buffer zone
programs.flavor: Slows a rival's advance.
programs.load: Place an Impact token within range. Discard token when this action is taken again.
programs.effect: Rival models consider the area within RED of the impact token to be an obstacle for moving and shooting.

programs.name: contagion
programs.load: Hack the target. If this targets a Cyber-Character, this action is GREEN.
programs.effect: When a Hacked rival ends its activation, all rivals within RED of that model gain Hacked token.

programs.name: coordinate surge
programs.flavor: I've pinged your location.
programs.load: Target friendly model may make an unobstructed RED move action.
programs.effect: +1 [Reflex]

programs.name: crab drone control
programs.flavor: Control, Reclaim, and Breach drones, for that hard to get loot.
programs.load: Deploy one CRaB Drone within RED.
programs.effect: When this model makes a basic move action, all friendly CRaB Drones may move the same distance. If a Drone ends a move wihin reach of a body token, discard the token and the Drone and this model draws one Loot. If a Drone ends within reach of an enemy, the enemy must win a Reflexes roll vs. the Obstacle die or suffer a wound, then the Drone is discarded.

programs.name: cripple movement
programs.load: Hack the target. If this targets a Cyber-Character, this action is GREEN.
programs.effect: Hacked rivals suffer -1 to their Reflexes skill.

programs.name: cripple wave
programs.flavor: Neural static bursts disrupt rival's movement.
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Hacked rivals count as crossing an obstacle at the start of all their move actions.

programs.name: death dealer
programs.flavor: Death won't take you before you draw blood!
programs.effect: When a friendly Character is taken out, that Character can take a free basic Melee or basic Ranged attack before being removed.

programs.name: death mark
programs.flavor: One cut, one kill.
programs.load: Hack the taget.
programs.effect: Melee attacks targeting Hacked rivals gain Deadly.

programs.name: eagle eye
programs.flavor: A MaxTac special, acquire and eliminate targets.
programs.effect: Ranged attacks by friendly models within YELLOW gain Accurate.

programs.name: enhanced reflexes
programs.flavor: Like a leaf on the wind.
programs.effect: Whenever a friendly model within GREEN uses a Luck token, it may immediately move YELLOW.

programs.name: enhanced targeting
programs.flavor: Enhance allies' targeting capabilities.
programs.effect: All visible friendly Characters within GREEN gain +1 Ranged and Deadly Crits  to all Ranged attacks.

programs.name: eraser
programs.load: Hack the target. If this targets a Cyber-Character, this action is GREEN.
programs.effect: This Netrunner is never visible to Hacked rivals.

programs.name: every fool has his day
programs.flavor: Look out behind you!
programs.load: All Fools wihtin RED may move YELLOW and then make an attack for free.

programs.name: falsified info
programs.flavor: …wrong safe house… IT'S A TRA-
programs.load: Move target enemy model GREEN.

programs.name: flak
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Hacked rivals suffer -1 to their Ranged skill.

programs.name: hellbolt
programs.load: [Deadly, Indirect] This attack may only target vulnerable Netrunners.

programs.name: homing beacon
programs.flavor: Beep beep beepbeepbeep
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Attacks with Blast that target Hacked rivals gain Stun 1 and Deadly Crits.

programs.name: hidey hole
programs.flavor: Now you see me…
programs.effect: When this model is targeted by a Ranged attack, count each obstacle in the Path of Attack twice.

programs.name: hyper empathy
programs.flavor: Ouch! This was a bad idea…
programs.effect: This model may [RE]act to any visible model suffering a wound as if it had suffered the wound. This model may not [RE]act if the target [RE]acts.

programs.name: i am rubber
programs.flavor: …and you are glue!
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: This model may take actions from the Gear of hacked rivals as if this model had the Gear equiped. If the action causes the Gear to be discarded, the rival must discard it.

programs.name: instill rage
programs.flavor: Rawr.
programs.load: Target may make an unobstructed YELLOW move for free, then take an action using a Ready Action token.

programs.name: junk.exe
programs.flavor: Knew it would come in handy…
programs.effect: This model gains a bonus to all rolls equal to the number of Loot cards it has equipped.

programs.name: leaping tyger
programs.flavor: Enhance allies' reflexes and situational awareness.
programs.effect: All friendly Characters gain +2 [Reflex]

programs.name: linked tech
programs.flavor: Please document any borrowed supplies.
programs.load: Select an action on a Gear attached to another friendly model within range. Immediately take that action for free. Actions with Discard may not be selected.

programs.name: lookout
programs.flavor: Impact and disrupt perps' evasive capabilities.
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Hacked rivals subtract 1 from Reflex rolls for each Hacked token on them.

programs.name: magnetic shielding
programs.flavor: A slim chance of cancer, but what's a tumor tomorrow compared to a bullet today?
programs.load: Target a friendly model within range.
programs.effect: Attach this card to the target. This card counts as an Armor Gear with Armor value equal to Tech Skill of Netrunner who launched this Program. This armor is discarded as normal if defense roll is failed.

programs.name: mark target
programs.flavor: I've lit up the priority targets.
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Attacks targeting Hacked rivals gain Accurate and Stun 1.

programs.name: media drone control
programs.flavor: She lowered her assault rifle and she's… she's picking her nose, folkes! Wait, now she's looking at the camera and lifting her rifle and… oh.
programs.load: Deploy one Media Drone within GREEN. Discard any Media Drones previously deployed by this program.
programs.effect: When this model makes a basic move action all friendly Media Drones may move the same distance. All friendly models may determine their Path of Attack using the Media Drone instead of their own location (range is still determined normally).

programs.name: memory dump
programs.flavor: I've linked you in.
programs.effect: When other visible friendly models have a chance to [RE]act, they may use one of this model's ready Action tokens to do so.

programs.name: metal surge
programs.flavor: A mechanical surge for you and your friends.
programs.load: Each friendly Character within YELLOW (including this model) Refreshes 1.

programs.name: militec spyware
programs.flavor: I hate surveilling boring people.
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: All of your models consider all Hacked models visible.

programs.name: molassess.exe
programs.flavor: Just a few hundred extra useless tasks in the processor.
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Hacked rivals may not take [RE]actions unless they first discard a Luck token.

programs.name: monkey wisedom
programs.flavor: Predictive AI navigate terrain and evades attacks.
programs.effect: +2 [Reflex]

programs.name: nano regenerator
programs.flavor: You see, the jokes is that I injected your friend's body with nano bots and used them as a sort of meat puppet. How are you not getting this? Ok, let's start over. Pretend they're still your friend. 'Knock, knock..'
programs.load: Target a Body token. Deploy a Fool within reach of the token and then discard the token.
programs.refresh: Reload when a friendly model is taken out.

programs.name: nervous system overload
programs.flavor: …it was leaking right out of his ears, I tell ya…
programs.load: If the target is hacked, gain Deadly.

programs.name: neural activator
programs.flavor: Don't worry about the interns, we chipped their brains.
programs.load: All friendly visible Gonks within YELLOW immediately take one action for free.

programs.name: overheat
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Hacked rivals suffer -1 to their Melee skill.

programs.name: overlock
programs.flavor: Keep those legs moving.
programs.load: Target friendly model moves GREEN.
programs.effect: +1 [Reflex]

programs.name: poison flatline
programs.load: [Indirect] Target vulnerable Netrunner must discard a Running program of their choice.

programs.name: program 7
programs.load: Choose one of the target's available actions (including basic actions) and choose a valid target for it. Resolve that action as if the taget was taking the action for free (this may make a model attack a model it considers friendly).

programs.name: puppet master
programs.load: Choose one of the target's available actions (including basic actions) and choose a valid target for it. Resolve that action as if the taget was taking the action for free (this may make a model attack a model it considers friendly).
programs.refresh: Use an Action Token to reload.

programs.name: ransomware
programs.flavor: Your apes, please.
programs.load: Hack the target, place two Hacked tokens on the target instead of one.
programs.effect: Whenever a rival removes a Hacked token, it must roll one RED die. On a fumble, it suffers a wound.

programs.name: reboot optics
programs.load: Hack the target. If this targets a Cyber-Character, this action is GREEN.
programs.effect: Only models within RED are visible to Hacked models.

programs.name: request backup
programs.load: Deploy 2 Gonks on any table edge, at least GREEN away from all rival models.

programs.name: responsive suits
programs.flavor: Reports of the auto-suits turning on their users are highly exagerated.
programs.load: Each friend model within RED gains a bonus to its Melee attack rolls equal to its highest Armor value.

programs.name: running rabbit
programs.flavor: Spike the adrenaline of nearby allies to give them a boost of speed.
programs.load: All friendly models wihin YELLOW may make a free YELLOW move action.

programs.name: shield
programs.effect: This model gains Defense Tech +2.

programs.name: signal garbage
programs.effect: Models (friendly and rival) do not remove Hacked tokens when their controller Inspires.

programs.name: sonic shock
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Hacked rivals treat all of their rival's actions as Silent.

programs.name: spread out
programs.flavor: On your six…
programs.load: All friendly models within GREEN may move RED for free.
programs.effect: +1 [Influence]

programs.name: stomp.exe
programs.flavor: Get 'em, boys… oh. And girl. Sorry Susie.
programs.load: All friendly Gonks within GREEN may immediately take a basic Melee attack for free.

programs.name: suicide
programs.load: Choose one of the target's attacks that can be made at RED. If the chosen attack has Deadly, Deadly Crits, Rapid, or Stun, this attack gains the same keywords.

programs.name: synapse burnout
programs.load: [Deadly Crits] If this targets a Cyber-Character, this action is YELLOW.

programs.name: system reset
programs.load: [Stun 2] If this targets a Cyber-Character, this action is YELLOW.

programs.name: tag!
programs.flavor: Neural networks linked… improving predictive algorithms…
programs.effect: At the end of this model's activation, you may activate another Character within reach.

programs.name: take ya with me
programs.flavor: Ahahahaha AHAHAHAHA
programs.effect: Whenever this model is within a Blast area, it may choose to increase the radius of the Blast to YELLOW.
programs.refresh: Reload when this model suffers a wound.

programs.name: takedown
programs.flavor: Government grade ICE, puts the perp out quick.
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: When a Hacked rival takes a wound from a Melee attack, they are taken out.
programs.refresh: Discard when a hacked rival is taken out by this program.

programs.name: tango down
programs.flavor: Maximize target prioritization and finding the weak spots.
programs.effect: Ranged attacks made by friendly models within RED gain Deadly Crits.

programs.name: treasure seeker
programs.flavor: Identifies RFID tags and other commercial value indicators.
programs.effect: Any friendly models within GREEN drawing Loot cards may draw 2 instead of 1.

programs.name: trojan alpha
programs.flavor: Just wait and see…
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: When a Hacked rival is taken out, deploy one Gonk within reach of it before removing the model.

programs.name: weapon glitch
programs.load: Hack the target.
programs.effect: Hacked rivals may not make attacks other than basic Melee and basic Ranged attacks.

programs.name: witness me
programs.flavor: Mirrored digital reflex engrams boost combat performance.
programs.effect: Other friendly models within RED gain +1 Melee and Deadly Crits on all melee attacks.
